alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:24AM CDT until July 17 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cass County in southwestern Iowa... Western Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 823 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atlantic Municipal Airport, or near Atlantic, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wiota around 835 AM CDT. Cumberland around 840 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Massena, Bridgewater, Fontanelle and Nodaway Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
